{{see also|Wahrung}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{affix|de|währen|-ung}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvɛːʀʊŋ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Währung.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Währungen}} # [[currency]], bank notes and cents, die Münzen und Banknoten #: {{ux|de|Die Währung in vielen europäischen Ländern ist Euro.|The currency in many of the European countries is Euro.}} #: {{ux|de|eine harte Währung|a hard currency, a currency that's stable and strong for a long time}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|f}} # [[currency]] ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:lb:Money]]
